content: so many of you have enjoyed knitting the original version of this pattern oma s sokken and i wanted to share this variation which has been my go-to sock pattern lately this version has no cuff but is knit in ribbing from the top down and results in a super snug and cozy sock this pattern is definitely beginner-friendly or if you re an experienced sock knitter it s a fun alternate to knitting vanilla socks1 happy knitting
